question: What is meant when one has a dream of Allah?
answer:
QUESTION
I had a dream at the age of 8-9 that it was the Last Hour and i was very scared and crying and then I had an image of Allah. It was a white glowing thing and asked me what was wrong and I said I wanted to go to mum.
ANSWER


Share:
Generally, such a dream is a reflection of one's constant remembrance and
consciousness of Allah Ta'ala.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
